title: Who is Ryan Routh, the man accused in Trump assassination attempt?
shortDescription: The trial in federal court in Florida began with jury selection on Sept. 8. Here's what we know about Ryan Routh and his past.

title: House GOP releases full Jeffrey Epstein 'birthday book.' What's in it?
shortDescription: House Republicans released the full Jeffrey Epstein 'birthday book,' including note purported to be from Donald Trump, which the president denies.

title: 'Constitutional freedoms are lost:' Sotomayor on pro-ICE ruling
shortDescription: The liberal justice called the order "unconscionably irreconcilable with our nation’s constitutional guarantees."

title: SCOTUS backs Trump raids. Here’s what we know now.
shortDescription: The Supreme Court let the Trump administration resume broad immigration stops in Los Angeles, raising civil rights concerns. Here’s what we know now.

title: Trump’s Epstein letter made public
shortDescription: House Democrats released President Donald Trump’s alleged Epstein birthday letter with cryptic message and lewd drawing.

title: Supreme Court backs Trump on aggressive immigration raids
shortDescription: The U.S. Supreme Court again backed President Donald Trump's hardline approach toward immigration on Monday, letting federal agents proceed with raids in Southern California targeting people for deportation based on their race or language.

title: Lewd Epstein letter allegedly signed by Trump goes public
shortDescription: The letter posted on social media shows Trump's alleged note to Epstein inside the outline of a woman's body.

title: Trump pushes school prayer guidelines
shortDescription: President Trump announces new upcoming guidance to protect prayer in public schools.

title: Trump brags about removing peace vigil near White House
shortDescription: The vigil has remained in Lafayette Square, near the White House, since 1981, but was quickly dismantled last weekend it came to Trump's attention.

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Inflation top issue for voters, poll
shortDescription: President Donald Trump received boos, applause at a recent appearance. What is the Trump approval rating? See latest opinion polls.

title: Supreme Court sides with Trump on controversial immigration policy
shortDescription: The administration's indiscriminate immigration-related stops sparked protests and charges of racial profiling.

title: Trump administration to issue new guidance on prayer in public schools
shortDescription: President Donald Trump spoke at the White House's Religious Liberty Commission meeting held Sept. 8 at the Museum of the Bible in Washington.

title: Supreme Court lets Trump remove FTC member for now
shortDescription: Chief Justice John Roberts temporarily blocked a lower court's order that Trump could not fire a Biden-appointed member of the Federal Trade Commission.

title: See moments from E. Jean Carroll’s legal fight with Trump
shortDescription: Explore key moments in E. Jean Carroll’s legal battle with Donald Trump, from allegations to courtroom victories.

title: Global refunds if Supreme Court strikes down Trump tariffs
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says the U.S. would have to provide refunds if the Supreme Court rules against President Donald Trump on tariffs.

title: Trump fails to overturn E. Jean Carroll's $83.3 million verdict
shortDescription: The same court upheld Carroll's separate $5 million jury verdict against Trump in from 2023 for a similar defamation and for sexual assault.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to ok cuts to foreign aid passed by Congress
shortDescription: In an emergency appeal, the Justice Department asked the Supreme Court to block a lower court's ruling that the foreign aid must be spent.

title: Trump booed at US open. He is the first president to attend since 2000
shortDescription: Donald Trump attended the US Open on Sept. 7 for the men's final. He was booed and cheered by spectators, like other sport tournaments he's attended.

title: Joni Ernst is out of Iowa's Senate race. Here's what it means for 2026
shortDescription: U.S. Sen. Joni Ernst's decision not to run for reelection has reset the Republican field, spurring U.S. Rep. Ashley Hinson to jump into the race.

title: Man accused of plotting to assassinate Trump goes on trial
shortDescription: Jury selection has begun in the case of Ryan Routh, the man accused of plotting to assassinate President Donald Trump.

title: Trump defends Chicago military threat
shortDescription: Donald Trump defends military threats to Chicago, sparking backlash from officials and residents.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's Chicago threat
shortDescription: Trump warns troops could be headed for the Windy City. Here is the news to know on Monday.
